title: UsageDetails
description: This schema defines the type for usage details. Daily, weekly, and monthly aggregation of usage is computed along with the percentile rank based on the usage for a given day.

usageStats.description: Type used to return usage statistics.

count.description: Usage count of a data asset on the start date.

percentileRank.description: Optional daily percentile rank data asset use when relevant.

dailyStats.description: Daily usage stats of a data asset on the start date.

weeklyStats.description: Weekly (last 7 days) rolling usage stats of a data asset on the start date.

monthlyStats.description: Monthly (last 30 days) rolling usage stats of a data asset on the start date.
